description.ko: 흙, 바위, 광물 형성의 가공되지 않은 아름다움을 매크로 렌즈를 통해 보여주는 지구의 복잡한 질감에 대한 추상적 표현입니다.
description.en: An abstract representation of Earth's complex textures, showcasing the raw beauty of soil, rock, and mineral formations through a macro lens.

prompt: Macro photography of layered earth textures, cracked clay, mineral veins, earthy tones of sienna and ochre, high detail, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, geological patterns.
